      • getPluginResourceDir

        public java.lang.String getPluginResourceDir()
        Returns the plugins own resource directory: "/resources/plugin id in lowercase/"
        To be used in Class.getResource(String) or Class.getResourceAsStream(String) from within the scope of the plugin.
        Specified by:
        getPluginResourceDir in interface PluginHelper
        Returns:
        the resource directory

      • getFileStreamFromResourceDirRoot

        public java.io.InputStream getFileStreamFromResourceDirRoot(java.lang.String path)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a InputStream representation of the passed file path.
        The path can possibly start with /resources/plugin id in lowercase/... as returned by getPluginResourceDir().
        Where ... is the file that is searched for.
        The file should exist in the class loader of the plugin.
        Specified by:
        getFileStreamFromResourceDirRoot in interface PluginHelper
        Parameters:
        path - a path to a resource file belonging to a plugin
        Returns:
        an InputStream of the found resource file, or null if the file was not found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
